content.text: Hey! How are you doing today?
Doing great thanks! How about you?
I'm doing well, thanks! Just getting started on my day.
What do you do for work?
I work in IT, but I'm also a musician.
Oh nice, what kind of music do you play?
I play the piano and the guitar.
Wow, that's awesome! I play the guitar too.
Really? That's great! What kind of music do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different types of music, but I mostly play rock and blues.
Oh cool, I like those too!
What's your favorite type of music to play?
I really like to play classical music.
Oh that's cool. I don't really listen to a lot of classical music, but I can appreciate it.
Yeah, it's not for everyone. But I love the way it makes me feel.
I can understand that. I like music that makes me feel good.
Me too! I think that's what makes music so great. It can make you feel anything.
Yeah, it's definitely a powerful thing
